statements: SELECT * FROM trade_history ORDER BY trade_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trade_symbol, entry_price, exit_price FROM trade_history WHERE trade_type='BUY';
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_result FROM trade_history WHERE entry_price > 100 AND exit_price < 150;
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol, trade_type FROM trade_history WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY entry_price DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT trade_symbol FROM trade_history ORDER BY trade_symbol ASC;
SELECT * FROM trade_history WHERE trade_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol, entry_price FROM trade_history WHERE trade_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol, trade_result FROM trade_history WHERE entry_price > exit_price AND trade_type = 'Sell' LIMIT 10;
SELECT trade_id, trade_type, (exit_price - entry_price) AS profit_loss FROM trade_history WHERE trade_result = 'Profit' ORDER BY profit_loss DESC;
SELECT AVG(entry_price) AS avg_entry_price, MAX(entry_price) AS max_entry_price, MIN(entry_price) AS min_entry_price FROM trade_history WHERE trade_symbol IN ('AAPL', 'GOOGL');
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_symbol, trade_volume, trade_price FROM trade_history;
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol, trade_price FROM trade_history WHERE trade_volume > 1000;
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_price FROM trade_history WHERE trade_volume BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM trade_history ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol, trade_volume FROM trade_history WHERE trade_price > 50 ORDER BY trade_volume DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_symbol, trade_volume, trade_price FROM trade_history WHERE trade_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trade_price DESC, trade_volume ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT strategy_name, win_rate, sharpe_ratio FROM performance_metrics WHERE win_rate > 0.75 AND sharpe_ratio > 1.5 ORDER BY metric_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM trade_history WHERE trade_symbol IN ('AAPL', 'AMZN', 'GOOGL') ORDER BY trade_date ASC, trade_volume DESC LIMIT 8;
SELECT trade_symbol, AVG(trade_price) AS avg_price FROM trade_history GROUP BY trade_symbol HAVING AVG(trade_price) > 100 ORDER BY AVG(trade_price) DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trade_id, trade_symbol, trade_volume, trade_price FROM trade_history WHERE trade_volume > 1000 AND trade_price < 50 ORDER BY trade_date ASC, trade_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM trade_history;
SELECT trade_id, symbol, trade_date FROM trade_history ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT symbol, trade_price, trade_quantity FROM trade_history WHERE trade_quantity > 100;
SELECT trade_id, trade_price, trade_quantity FROM trade_history WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM trade_history WHERE trade_quantity < 50 AND trade_price > 100 ORDER BY trade_quantity DESC, trade_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM trade_history ORDER BY trade_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT symbol, trade_price FROM trade_history WHERE trade_quantity > 100 ORDER BY trade_price ASC
SELECT DISTINCT symbol, trade_date FROM trade_history WHERE trade_price > 100 ORDER BY symbol, trade_date
SELECT th.symbol, pm.total_return, pm.sharpe_ratio FROM trade_history th INNER JOIN performance_metrics pm ON th.trade_id = pm.trade_id WHERE pm.sharpe_ratio > 1.5 ORDER BY pm.total_return DESC
SELECT ts.strategy_name, ts.strategy_description FROM trading_strategies ts
SELECT * FROM trade_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT action, instrument, quantity, price FROM trade_history WHERE strategy_id = 1 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT trade_id, action, instrument FROM trade_history WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM strategy_performance WHERE date = '2022-06-30';
SELECT strategy_id, total_profit, win_rate FROM strategy_performance WHERE total_trades > 100 ORDER BY total_profit DESC;
SELECT trade_id, timestamp, instrument, quantity FROM trade_history WHERE action = 'BUY';
SELECT strategy_id, date, total_profit, win_rate FROM strategy_performance ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM strategy_metrics WHERE sharpe_ratio > 2.5 AND annual_return < 10.0;
SELECT result_id, strategy_id, start_date, end_date FROM backtest_results WHERE performance_metric = 'Sharpe Ratio' ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT trade_id, timestamp, action, quantity, price FROM trade_history WHERE instrument = 'AAPL' AND quantity > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM trade_history;
SELECT trade_id, ticker_symbol, trade_price FROM trade_history ORDER BY trade_price DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, metric_date, profit_loss FROM performance_metrics WHERE win_rate > 0.5;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM backtesting_strategies WHERE created_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM strategy_parameters WHERE strategy_id = 3;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, ticker_symbol, trade_qty, trade_price FROM trade_history WHERE trade_type='Buy' ORDER BY trade_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT metric_date, traded_volume, profit_loss, win_rate FROM performance_metrics WHERE strategy_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY metric_date ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description, created_by, created_date FROM backtesting_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 2;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM strategy_parameters WHERE strategy_id = 4 ORDER BY parameter_name;
SELECT log_date, log_message FROM strategy_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 5;
